entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 10:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries changing to a few flurries near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
